text: Gerstner is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Eli Gerstner (born 1980), American Orthodox Jewish singer/songwriter and producer *František Josef Gerstner (1756–1832), Czech railway engineer *František Antonín Gerstner (1795–1840), Czech railway engineer *Harry Gerstner (born 1884), American woodworker and founder of H. Gerstner & Sons *John Gerstner (1914–1996), Professor of Church History *Louis V. Gerstner, Jr. (born 1942), chairman of the board and CEO of IBM *Sascha Gerstner (born 1977), German musician and photographer *Siegfried Gerstner (1916–2013), German military officer and Knight's Cross recipient *Thomas Gerstner (born 1966), German football manager and player ==See also== *3887 Gerstner, main-belt asteroid Category:German-language surnames
title: Gerstner
